response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to own this item at a special price of $750,000. This exceptional piece is not just an object; it represents a significant investment and a potential source of great joy or utility for its owner. I believe that with your appreciation for such items, you would be able to fully realize its true worth. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
